entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
